name: Dreamlike Mix
description:
A relaxing match-three game that’s easy to play!

Super incredible Match-3 game! Set out on an epic journey across more than 30 fantastic locations together with the most famous fairy tale characters in the world in the new match three game — "Dreamlike Mix", created by the developer "Nika Entertainment — candy puzzle adventure"

► Match beads from the magic bracelet three in a row, and mix gems to get the super beads!
► Solve challenging puzzles and fight with dozens of villains!
► Blow super elements and enjoy the colorful effects and juicy graphics!
► Get treasures, upgrade the characters’ skills and become stronger!
► Get more stars together with your helpers: Puss in Boots, Little Red Riding Hood, the Three Little Pigs!
► Unlock the force of the most powerful boosters: Magic Bow, Magic Mirror, and Magic Lamp!
► Travel around the amazing world and defeat villains making bright combinations of three elements in a row!

But that’s not all what awaits you in the Match-3 game "Dreamlike Mix"!
► New levels: gravitation change, labyrinth, flying platforms and many more.
► Make up additional combinations: mix up to five beads in a row!
► Gain stars, compete with your friends, beat their high scores!
► Synchronize your account with Facebook and get a reward!
► Help your friends to match 3 beads in a row by sending them gifts!

Do you like playing King or SGN games? Then be sure to download free colorful match-3 game — "Dreamlike Mix", where you will find a lot of adventures!

If you enjoyed the journey, visit the website of the developer — "Nika Entertainment — candy puzzle adventure", and learn about other juicy three in a row games:
nikaent.com

Remember to Like the game:
facebook.com/dreamlikemix
